#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

long long gcd(long long a,long long b){
if (a<0) return gcd(-a,b);
if (b<0) return gcd(a,-b);
if (!b) return a;
else return gcd(b,a%b);
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t-->0)
    {
                long long int a,b,c,d,p,q,f=0,l;
                cin>>a>>b>>c>>d;
                p=gcd(a,b);
                q=gcd(c,d);
                //cout<<p<<endl;
                if(p==0)
                {
                if(q==0)
                f=1;
                }
                else if(q%p!=0)
                {
                     f=0;
                }
                else
                {
                    l=q/p;
                    while(l!=0 && l%2==0)
                    l=l/2;
                    if(l==1)
                    f=1;
                }
                if(f==1)
                cout<<"YES"<<endl;
                else
                cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
